description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. Create a hilarious custom rap song, or battle a friend or AI for the best rhymes while throwing "Yo Mama" insults. Solo rappers may compete for global high scores. All performances can be saved and replayed for a good laugh. Choose a single word (from hundreds of available words) and the game will formulate a sentence around it, so boring grammar won’t stand in the way of your dope rhymes!
